meaningMnemonic: There’s a <radical>tree</radical> in the <radical>east</radical> that looks like a <kanji>building</kanji>. The tree is tall and straight and doesn't have any leaves or branches. It's basically a big wooden building.
readingMnemonic: That <kanji>building</kanji> happens to be in the center of <reading>とう</reading>きょう. If you need to find east (which is where とうきょう is), you just look for the building.
